citations.narrative:
There was a strong ammonia odor in the guinea pig facility. One window was slightly open. The licensee opened some
vents and the odor dissipated.
Failure to provide fresh air can cause respiratory distress and expose the guinea pigs to potential disease hazards.
The indoor housing facilities must be ventilated to minimize odors and ensure the health of the animals.
Correct by: Corrected during the inspection. Correct by continuing to provide adequate ventilation from 3/6/24 forward
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.26(b) 
   
Facilities, indoor. 
There was a strong ammonia odor in the guinea pig facility. One window was slightly open. The licensee opened some 
vents and the odor dissipated. 
Failure to provide fresh air can cause respiratory distress and expose the guinea pigs to potential disease hazards.  
The indoor housing facilities must be ventilated to minimize odors and ensure the health of the animals. 
Correct by: Corrected during the inspection. Correct by continuing to provide adequate ventilation from 3/6/24 forward 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
